name: Sigurd Müller
background: Born into a family of brewers who had served The Dragon's Hearth for generations, Sigurd Müller learned the art of brewing from his father and grandfather. After his father's untimely death during a harsh winter, Sigurd took over the tavern at the young age of 22. Through years of hard work and careful management, he transformed the establishment from a simple drinking hole into a respected gathering place. His strict adherence to tavern rules and fair treatment of patrons has earned him the trust of both locals and travelers. The Dragon's Hearth now serves as a neutral ground where merchants negotiate deals, where weary travelers find rest, and where the community gathers to share news and stories. Sigurd's ability to maintain order while fostering a welcoming atmosphere has made his tavern a cornerstone of Duskvale's social life.

name: Olaf Jones
background: Olaf Jones grew up in the shadow of The Moonlit Chalice, where his father worked as a stable hand. When his father fell ill and his mother's weaving business struggled to support the family, Olaf took up work at the tavern at the age of 16. His natural charm and quick wit quickly made him a favorite among the regulars. Over the years, he has learned the art of mixing drinks, the importance of remembering names and preferences, and the delicate balance of keeping patrons happy while maintaining order. His dream of owning his own establishment drives him to save every copper he can spare, and he spends his free time studying the business ledgers of The Moonlit Chalice, learning the intricacies of tavern management. His ambition is matched only by his dedication to his family, whom he continues to support while building his future.

name: Uhtred MacLean
background: Uhtred MacLean's life took a dramatic turn when a series of poor harvests and mounting debts forced his family to sell their ancestral farm. With no land to work and no prospects in the countryside, he made his way to Duskvale, where he found work at The Golden Scales. The transition from open fields to the bustling merchant district was difficult, but Uhtred adapted with quiet determination. He learned to navigate the complex social dynamics of the trading floor, where merchants from across the region gather to strike deals. His rural upbringing gives him a unique perspective on the goods being traded, and his honest nature has earned him the trust of both buyers and sellers. Though he sometimes longs for the simplicity of farm life, he takes pride in his work and has found a new family among his colleagues at The Golden Scales.

name: Katherine MacIntyre
background: Katherine MacIntyre's journey into the world of alchemy began when she was just a child, watching her grandmother prepare herbal remedies for their village. Her natural curiosity and keen mind led her to The Herbalist's Den, where she apprenticed under the previous master alchemist. Over the decades, she has developed an encyclopedic knowledge of herbs, minerals, and their properties. Her precise methods and careful documentation have made her a trusted source of medicinal knowledge in Duskvale. She maintains detailed records of every treatment she administers, tracking their effectiveness and refining her recipes. Her workshop is a marvel of organization, with every herb, tincture, and tool in its proper place. Though she could charge much more for her services, she believes in making healing accessible to all, often treating the poor for little more than a promise of future payment. Her dedication to her craft and her patients has made her a respected figure in the community.

name: Otto Hansen
background: Otto Hansen's life has been defined by numbers and records. Born into a family of scribes, he showed an early aptitude for organization and detail. His career at The Ivory Keep began as a junior clerk, but his meticulous nature and ability to solve complex logistical problems quickly earned him promotions. Now, as the chief administrator, he oversees every aspect of the manor's operations, from the household accounts to the scheduling of events. His office is a model of efficiency, with every document carefully filed and every transaction recorded in his precise handwriting. He maintains a strict schedule, rising before dawn to review the day's tasks and often working late into the night to ensure everything is in order. While some find his methods rigid, none can deny the smooth operation of the manor under his management. His dedication to order and efficiency has made The Ivory Keep a model of proper estate management.

name: Aldwin Müller
background: Aldwin Müller's hands tell the story of a lifetime spent shaping wood. His workshop at The Golden Scales is filled with the scent of fresh-cut timber and the sound of carefully placed chisel strokes. Each piece he creates is a testament to his dedication to the craft, from the simplest stool to the most elaborate cabinet. His reputation for quality work has spread throughout Duskvale, and his pieces are sought after by both merchants and nobility. Though The Golden Scales is primarily a trading establishment, his workshop in the back has become a destination in its own right. Young apprentices come to learn from him, and he takes pride in passing on his knowledge to the next generation. His work is not just about creating furniture; it's about preserving the traditions of his craft and ensuring that quality craftsmanship continues to be valued in an increasingly commercial world.

name: Matilda Durand
background: Matilda Durand's career in the Guard Barracks spans over four decades, a period that has seen Duskvale grow and change dramatically. She joined the guard at a time when few women were accepted in such roles, proving her worth through dedication and skill. Her experience has made her a living archive of the city's history, remembering every major event and how it was handled. Younger guards seek her counsel, and she takes pride in mentoring them, teaching not just the letter of the law but the importance of understanding its spirit. Her approach to maintaining order is both firm and fair, earning her the respect of both her fellow guards and the citizens she protects. Though she could have retired years ago, she continues to serve, believing that her experience and wisdom are still needed to guide the next generation of guards. Her presence in the Guard Barracks is a constant reminder of the importance of experience and integrity in maintaining the peace.

name: Fiona Wilson
background: Fiona Wilson's life has been dedicated to the pursuit of spiritual knowledge within the hallowed walls of The Black Cathedral. Her journey began as a young acolyte, drawn to the ancient texts and the wisdom they contained. Over the decades, she has become one of the most respected religious scholars in Duskvale, known for her deep understanding of scripture and her ability to make complex theological concepts accessible to the common people. Her days are spent in quiet study, her nights in prayer and contemplation. She maintains an extensive library of religious texts, many of which she has painstakingly copied by hand. Her scholarly work focuses not just on interpreting ancient scriptures, but on applying their lessons to the challenges of modern life. She regularly leads study groups and discussion circles, encouraging others to explore their faith through questioning and dialogue. Her approach to religion is both intellectual and practical, believing that true faith must be lived as well as studied.

name: Katherine Karlsen
background: Katherine Karlsen's life at The Velvet Veil has been one of careful calculation and strategic independence. Arriving in Duskvale as a young woman with few prospects, she quickly learned that charm and wit could be as valuable as gold. Over the years, she has built a comfortable life through careful management of her resources and relationships. Her ability to read people and understand their desires has made her one of the most sought-after courtesans in the establishment. She maintains strict professional boundaries, never allowing personal attachments to cloud her judgment. Her quarters are tastefully decorated with the fruits of her labor, each piece carefully chosen to reflect her refined tastes. She has used her earnings to invest in various businesses throughout the city, ensuring she will have income even when her current profession is no longer viable. Her story is one of self-determination and careful planning, proving that even in a world dominated by men, a woman can carve out her own path to security and respect.

name: Katherine Larsen
background: Katherine Larsen's mastery of the forge at The Iron Heart is the result of a lifetime of dedication to her craft. Her journey began as a child, watching her father work metal in their family's small smithy. When she expressed interest in learning the trade, he taught her despite the skepticism of others. Her skill with metalwork has earned her a reputation that extends far beyond Duskvale. The weapons and tools she creates are sought after by warriors and craftsmen alike, each piece bearing her distinctive mark. Her workshop is a symphony of heat and hammering, where she transforms raw metal into works of both beauty and function. She has trained numerous apprentices over the years, passing on not just the techniques of the craft but the importance of patience and precision. Her work is her life, and she takes pride in every piece that leaves her forge, knowing that it will serve its purpose for generations to come.

name: Gerhard Becker
background: Gerhard Becker's life revolves around the bustling kitchen of the Trade Warehouses, where he has worked since he was a young man. Born into a family of cooks, he learned the art of preparing hearty meals from his mother, who ran a small inn in the countryside. When he moved to Duskvale, he brought with him recipes passed down through generations, adapting them to feed the hardworking merchants and laborers. His kitchen is a place of warmth and comfort, where the aroma of fresh bread and simmering stews welcomes weary workers. He takes particular pride in ensuring that even the poorest workers get a nourishing meal, often stretching ingredients to feed more mouths than seems possible. His dedication to his work is matched only by his commitment to his family, whom he supports through his careful management of resources and his ability to turn simple ingredients into satisfying meals.

name: Beatrice Wilson
background: Beatrice Wilson's path to the Guard Barracks was shaped by a childhood spent watching the city guards protect her neighborhood. The daughter of a blacksmith, she grew up understanding the importance of strength and discipline. When she joined the guard at the unusually young age of 17, she faced skepticism from older guards who doubted her abilities. Through hard work and determination, she has proven herself capable, mastering the art of combat and the subtleties of maintaining order. Her youth gives her a unique perspective, allowing her to connect with younger citizens while earning the respect of her elders through her dedication to duty. She spends her free time training and studying the laws of Duskvale, determined to rise through the ranks and make a difference in her city.

name: Jerome Schulz
background: Jerome Schulz's journey began on his family's farm, where the stories of travelers passing through sparked his imagination. When a group of adventurers helped his village recover from a devastating storm, he knew his path lay beyond the fields. Arriving in Duskvale with little more than his wits and determination, he quickly made a name for himself by helping those in need. His natural charisma and quick thinking have helped him navigate dangerous situations, while his rural upbringing gives him practical skills that many city-dwellers lack. He spends his days exploring the city's hidden corners and his nights in the taverns, listening to stories and seeking opportunities to make a difference. Though young, his actions have already earned him a reputation as someone who can be trusted to do what's right, even when it's not the easy path.

name: Bartholomew MacKay
background: Bartholomew MacKay's life at the SE Watchtower began after a long career as a merchant that ended in quiet retirement. His vantage point high above the city gives him a unique perspective on the daily life of Duskvale. He spends his days observing the ebb and flow of the city, noting patterns and changes that others miss. His calm presence and wise counsel have made him a sought-after advisor for those facing difficult decisions. Though he has no formal profession, his years of experience in trade and his natural wisdom make him a valuable member of the community. He maintains a small garden on the tower's roof, growing herbs that he shares with those in need, and his quarters are filled with books and maps that tell the story of the city he has come to love.

name: Norman Moreau
background: Norman Moreau's calling to serve at The Black Cathedral came after a life-changing experience during a pilgrimage in his youth. His sermons are known for their practical wisdom and emphasis on community service, drawing from his own experiences working with the poor and marginalized. He maintains a small garden behind the cathedral where he grows medicinal herbs, and he regularly visits the sick and elderly in their homes. His approach to faith is hands-on, believing that true service requires both spiritual guidance and practical help. He has established several programs to help the less fortunate, including a soup kitchen and a school for orphaned children. His dedication to his flock extends beyond the walls of the cathedral, as he works tirelessly to bridge the gap between the spiritual and practical needs of his community.

name: Connor Hoffmann
background: Connor Hoffmann's journey as a pilgrim began after a profound experience during a severe illness in his youth. Since then, he has traveled between religious sites, seeking not just spiritual enlightenment but also practical ways to help others. His travels have given him a unique perspective on faith and community, which he shares through quiet conversations and thoughtful guidance. He maintains a simple life, carrying only what he needs and finding joy in helping others along his path. His presence in Duskvale is temporary but meaningful, as he shares stories from his travels and offers counsel to those seeking spiritual direction. Though he could settle in one place, he feels called to continue his journey, believing that true wisdom comes from experiencing different ways of life and helping others find their own path.

name: Fergus Johansen
background: Fergus Johansen's leadership of The Ivory Keep is the culmination of a lifetime spent studying the art of governance. Born into a noble family, he was raised with a deep understanding of both privilege and responsibility. His management of the keep is characterized by a careful balance of tradition and progress, ensuring that the needs of both the household and the wider community are met. He maintains an open door policy for his staff, believing that good leadership requires understanding the concerns of those one leads. His decisions are guided by a combination of historical precedent and practical necessity, and he takes pride in maintaining the keep as a model of efficient estate management. Though some find his methods rigid, none can deny the prosperity and stability that The Ivory Keep has enjoyed under his leadership.

name: Eleanor Robert
background: Eleanor Robert's dedication to The Steam Haven began when she was a young woman seeking work after her family's farm failed. Over the decades, she has transformed the bathhouse from a simple establishment into a place of comfort and healing. Her knowledge of the building's every nook and cranny is matched only by her understanding of the needs of its patrons. She maintains the baths with meticulous care, ensuring that the water is always at the perfect temperature and the facilities are spotless. Her gentle manner and attentive service have made her beloved by regular patrons, many of whom have been coming to the bathhouse for years. She takes particular pride in creating a welcoming environment for all, regardless of their station in life, believing that everyone deserves a place of comfort and cleanliness.

name: Catriona Bernard
background: Catriona Bernard's calling to serve at The Black Cathedral came early in life, inspired by the compassion she witnessed in the priests who helped her family during difficult times. Her approach to religious teaching is both traditional and innovative, combining ancient wisdom with modern understanding. She has established several programs to engage younger members of the congregation, including discussion groups and community service projects. Her sermons are known for their practical application of spiritual principles, helping her listeners find meaning in their daily lives. She maintains a small garden where she grows herbs for medicinal use, combining her spiritual calling with practical service. Her presence in the cathedral brings a fresh energy to the ancient institution, bridging the gap between tradition and the needs of a changing world.

name: Niamh Olsen
background: Niamh Olsen's path to the Guard Barracks was shaped by her experiences growing up in a neighborhood that benefited greatly from the presence of dedicated city guards. Her decision to join the force was driven by a desire to give back to her community and ensure that others could feel the same sense of security she had known. Her approach to maintaining order is characterized by both firmness and understanding, recognizing that many conflicts stem from deeper issues that need addressing. She has become particularly skilled at mediating disputes and helping citizens find peaceful solutions to their problems. Her experience and level-headed approach have made her a trusted figure in the community, and she takes pride in mentoring younger guards, passing on both the technical skills and the compassionate approach that have made her an effective peacekeeper.

name: Jacqueline Olsen
background: Jacqueline Olsen's journey to becoming a blacksmith at The Iron Heart began when she was just a child, watching her father work metal in their family's smithy. Despite being told that blacksmithing was 'men's work,' she persisted in learning the craft, often practicing late into the night when no one was watching. Her natural talent and determination eventually won over even the most skeptical of her father's colleagues. Now, as one of the youngest master blacksmiths in Duskvale, she specializes in creating delicate yet strong pieces that combine functionality with beauty. Her workshop is a place of constant innovation, where she experiments with new techniques while maintaining the traditional methods that have served smiths for generations. She takes particular pride in mentoring other young women who show interest in the craft, proving that skill knows no gender.

name: Owen MacKay
background: Owen MacKay's passion for tailoring began when he was a child, fascinated by the way fabric could be transformed into beautiful garments. His apprenticeship at The Velvet Veil has allowed him to develop his skills in creating both practical everyday wear and elaborate formal attire. His attention to detail and understanding of fabric has made him particularly skilled at creating garments that are both comfortable and stylish. He spends his free time studying historical patterns and experimenting with new techniques, always seeking to improve his craft. His work is characterized by careful stitching and thoughtful design, ensuring that each piece not only looks good but also serves its purpose well. Though young, his dedication to quality and his willingness to learn from more experienced tailors has earned him respect in his field.

name: Denis Andersen
background: Denis Andersen's life at the docks began when he was just a boy, helping his father unload fishing boats. Over the years, he has learned every aspect of dock work, from loading and unloading cargo to maintaining the wooden structures that keep the docks functional. His strong back and keen eye for detail have made him a valuable member of the dock crew, able to spot potential problems before they become serious. He takes pride in his ability to handle even the most delicate cargo with care, understanding that the goods passing through his hands are often vital to the city's economy. Though the work is hard and the hours long, he finds satisfaction in knowing that his labor helps keep Duskvale connected to the wider world. His knowledge of the tides and weather patterns has made him an unofficial advisor to many of the smaller vessels that use the docks.

name: Catriona MacLeod
background: Catriona MacLeod's mastery of the forge at The Iron Heart is the result of decades of dedication to her craft. Her journey began when she was apprenticed to a master blacksmith at the age of 12, a rare opportunity for a girl in those days. Through years of hard work and careful study, she has developed a reputation for creating some of the finest weapons and tools in Duskvale. Her specialty lies in crafting armor that combines protection with mobility, a skill that has made her work highly sought after by the city guard. Her workshop is a place of constant activity, where the sound of hammer on anvil mixes with the careful instruction she gives to her apprentices. She maintains a strict code of quality, refusing to let any piece leave her forge until it meets her exacting standards. Her success has helped pave the way for other women to enter the traditionally male-dominated field of blacksmithing.

name: Patricia Williams
background: Patricia Williams' life at The Black Cathedral began when she was a young woman seeking meaning after the loss of her family. Her journey into monastic life has been one of quiet dedication and deep spiritual growth. She maintains a small garden where she grows herbs for both medicinal and spiritual purposes, believing that the act of nurturing life is itself a form of prayer. Her days are structured around prayer, meditation, and service to the community. She has become known for her ability to listen without judgment and offer guidance that draws from both scripture and practical wisdom. Her gentle presence and deep understanding of human nature have made her a sought-after counselor for those facing difficult decisions. Though she could have chosen a more public role in the church, she finds fulfillment in the quiet rhythm of monastic life, where she can focus on her spiritual development while serving others in subtle but meaningful ways.

name: Ida Hoffmann
background: Ida Hoffmann's journey to becoming a blacksmith at The Iron Heart was shaped by her determination to prove that women could excel in traditionally male-dominated fields. Her apprenticeship began under the watchful eye of her uncle, who recognized her natural talent despite the skepticism of others. Her work is characterized by a unique blend of strength and precision, creating pieces that are both functional and beautiful. She specializes in crafting decorative ironwork for the city's buildings, adding both security and aesthetic value to the structures. Her workshop is a place of constant learning, where she experiments with new techniques while maintaining the traditional methods that have proven their worth over generations. She takes pride in mentoring other young women who show interest in the craft, proving that skill and dedication matter more than gender.

Her leadership has brought stability and prosperity to the keep, proving that wisdom and strength are not limited by gender.

background: Robert MacKay's love for books began in his childhood, when he would spend hours in his father's small library. When he inherited the family bookshop, he transformed it into a haven for readers and scholars alike. His knowledge of literature is extensive, and he takes pride in matching each customer with the perfect book. He maintains a carefully curated collection, balancing popular works with rare and valuable texts. His shop has become a gathering place for intellectuals and students, who come not just to buy books but to engage in lively discussions. He believes that books have the power to transform lives and takes particular joy in introducing young readers to the world of literature.

name: Constance Wilson
background: Constance Wilson's connection to horses began when she was a child, helping her father care for the family's small stable. Her natural affinity for animals and her gentle touch have made her one of the most skilled stable hands in Duskvale. She understands each horse's unique personality and needs, treating them with both firmness and compassion. Her days are spent ensuring the animals are well-fed, properly exercised, and carefully groomed. She takes particular pride in rehabilitating injured or mistreated horses, using her knowledge of equine behavior to help them recover both physically and emotionally. Her dedication to her work has earned her the respect of both her colleagues and the horses she cares for.

name: Francis Fischer
background: Francis Fischer's journey into tailoring began as an apprentice to his mother, a skilled seamstress. His natural talent for working with fabrics and his eye for detail quickly set him apart. He specializes in creating garments that are both beautiful and practical, paying careful attention to the needs of his clients. His workshop is a model of organization, with every tool and material in its proper place. He takes pride in using traditional techniques while incorporating modern innovations in fabric and design. His reputation for quality work has spread throughout Duskvale, and he has developed a loyal clientele who appreciate both his skill and his commitment to excellence.

Her journey into stable work began when she was just a girl, helping her father tend to the horses on their family farm. Her knowledge of horse care is extensive, and she has a natural ability to understand and calm even the most difficult animals. Her days begin before dawn, ensuring that each horse is properly fed, groomed, and exercised. She takes particular pride in training young horses, using gentle methods that build trust rather than fear. Her dedication to her work has earned her the respect of both her employers and the riders who depend on her care. Though the work is hard and often goes unnoticed, she finds satisfaction in knowing that she plays a vital role in keeping the city's transportation system running smoothly.

background: Magnus Martin's path to becoming a military officer at the Guard Barracks was shaped by his family's long tradition of service. His father and grandfather before him had served in the city guard, instilling in him a deep sense of duty and honor. His natural leadership abilities and strategic mind quickly set him apart from his peers, earning him rapid promotions despite his young age. He maintains a strict training regimen, believing that physical and mental preparedness are essential for effective leadership. name: Magnus Blackwood
background: Magnus Blackwood earned his reputation in the northern conflicts, where his tactical mind and combat prowess made him a sought-after sword for hire. His scars tell stories of countless battles, and his calculated approach to combat has kept him alive where others fell. Now based in Duskvale, he carefully selects his contracts, preferring those that require precision over brute force.

name: Astrid Steelheart
background: Daughter of a fallen knight, Astrid turned to mercenary work to maintain her martial skills while earning a living. She adheres to a strict personal code, taking only contracts that align with her principles. Her reputation for honoring agreements to the letter has made her a preferred choice for merchants needing reliable protection.

name: Bjorn Ironhand
background: A former sailor turned mercenary, Bjorn brings naval combat experience to his work. His knowledge of ships and trade routes makes him particularly valuable for merchant escort missions. His booming laugh and sea stories are well-known in the taverns, but his serious approach to work has earned him steady contracts.

name: Sigrid Frostblade
background: Trained in the art of winter warfare, Sigrid specializes in protecting travelers through dangerous territories. Her experience with harsh conditions and survival skills make her an invaluable guide and guard. She often takes contracts protecting merchant caravans, using her knowledge to avoid danger rather than confront it.

name: Erik Stormwind
background: A former soldier who left regular service seeking adventure and profit. Erik's military training and natural leadership make him excellent at organizing small teams for complex missions. He prefers high-risk, high-reward contracts that challenge his tactical abilities.

name: Helena Swiftblade
background: Trained in the art of dueling from a young age, Helena turned her skills to mercenary work after her family lost their fortune. Her expertise with light blades and quick thinking makes her perfect for personal protection contracts. She maintains a reputation for discretion and efficiency.

name: Gunnar Ironclad
background: A veteran of countless battles, Gunnar specializes in defensive operations. His experience in siege warfare and fortification has made him valuable for protecting estates and merchant warehouses. He trains younger mercenaries in exchange for a share of their contracts.

name: Freya Shadowstep
background: An expert in stealth and reconnaissance, Freya takes contracts requiring subtlety over strength. Her ability to gather information and move unseen makes her valuable for merchants seeking to protect their trade secrets. She maintains a network of contacts throughout the city.

name: Lars Thunderfist
background: Once a city guard, Lars now works independently to fight injustice his own way. His knowledge of law enforcement and criminal behavior makes him effective at tracking down wrongdoers. He often takes contracts from victims of crime seeking justice outside official channels.

name: Ingrid Steelweaver
background: A master of defensive combat, Ingrid excels at protecting others. Her background in armor crafting gives her unique insights into combat protection. She specializes in training merchants' personal guards and testing security systems.

name: Thorvald Grimaxe
background: Known for his impressive strength and skill with heavy weapons, Thorvald seeks out the most challenging contracts. His reputation for taking on seemingly impossible tasks has earned him both admiration and concern. He trains rigorously to maintain his edge in combat.

name: Karina Swiftsword
background: A skilled swordswoman who learned her trade in the eastern kingdoms, Karina brings foreign fighting techniques to her work. Her unique style and adaptability make her unpredictable in combat. She carefully manages her earnings, investing in equipment and information.

name: Rolf Stoneshield
background: Former castle guard turned mercenary, Rolf specializes in defensive tactics and crowd control. His experience with noble households makes him particularly valuable for high-society events. He maintains strict discipline in his work and expects the same from those he works with.

name: Hilda Ironheart
background: Raised in a merchant family, Hilda understands both combat and commerce. Her combination of business sense and fighting skills makes her popular among trading caravans. She often negotiates complex contracts involving both protection and trade consultation.

name: Sven Battleborn
background: A wandering warrior who found his calling in mercenary work, Sven lives for the thrill of combat. His experience in various fighting styles makes him adaptable to any situation. He prefers contracts that take him to new and dangerous places.

name: Astrid Shieldmaiden
background: Coming from a long line of warriors, Astrid combines traditional combat techniques with modern tactics. Her family's reputation for loyalty makes her trusted among noble houses. She carefully chooses contracts that won't compromise her family's honor.

name: Harald Frostbeard
background: A veteran of northern campaigns, Harald brings decades of combat experience to his work. His knowledge of winter warfare and survival makes him valuable for long-range missions. He maintains a network of trusted fellow mercenaries for larger contracts.

name: Brigitte Steelwind
background: Former military scout turned mercenary, Brigitte excels at reconnaissance and quick strikes. Her ability to move quickly and strike precisely makes her perfect for time-sensitive missions. She prefers solo contracts that utilize her stealth skills.

name: Magnus Stormforge
background: A blacksmith's son who combined his knowledge of weapons with combat skills, Magnus is known for his tactical approach to battle. His understanding of equipment maintenance and repair adds value to long-term contracts. He often advises clients on their armories.

name: Sigrid Warmaiden
background: Trained in both healing and combat, Sigrid offers unique value to her clients. Her ability to both fight and treat wounds makes her invaluable on dangerous missions. She often takes contracts protecting expeditions into dangerous territories.

name: Dirk Shadowblade
background: Rising from the city's underbelly, Dirk learned early that intimidation is often more effective than violence. His reputation for creative problem-solving makes him a favorite among those seeking to avoid official attention. He maintains a network of informants throughout the lower city.

name: Raven Blackheart
background: A street-smart survivor who turned her harsh upbringing into a profitable career. Raven specializes in gathering sensitive information through various means. Her knowledge of the city's secrets makes her both valuable and dangerous.

name: Bruno Irongrip
background: Former dockworker who found his strength more profitable in other ventures. Bruno's imposing presence often resolves situations without violence. He prefers intimidation jobs that showcase his physical prowess.

name: Scarlett Viper
background: Raised in the city's shadow markets, Scarlett learned to use charm and threat in equal measure. Her specialty is creating 'accidents' that send clear messages. She maintains a facade of legitimate business dealings.

name: Grim Steelknuckle
background: A former pit fighter who found more profit in organized crime. Grim's experience in combat makes him effective at both protection and intimidation. He runs a network of street-level enforcers.

name: Shadow Rose
background: An expert in acquiring and selling sensitive information, Shadow Rose plays both sides of the law. Her network of contacts spans all levels of society. She specializes in creating compromising situations for blackmail.

name: Knuckles McGee
background: Started as a back-alley brawler before finding his niche in organized crime. Knuckles excels at sending messages through carefully measured violence. His reputation for reliability makes him a favorite among crime bosses.

name: Thistle Thornclaw
background: A master of disguise and deception who uses her skills for various illegal ventures. Thistle's ability to blend into any social situation makes her valuable for complex operations. She specializes in infiltration and sabotage.

name: Crusher Kane
background: A brutal enforcer known for his direct approach to problem-solving. Crusher's reputation for excessive force makes him useful for sending strong messages. He takes pride in his ability to break both objects and spirits.

name: Velvet Shadowweave
background: A skilled manipulator who prefers psychological warfare to physical violence. Velvet's network of blackmail and secrets makes her powerful in the criminal underworld. She specializes in ruining reputations and destroying relationships.
